differences: Divergence time estimate from Finstermeier et al. 2013
Finstermeier, K., Zinner, D., Brameier, M., Meyer, M., Kreuz, E., Hofreiter, M., & Roos, C. (2013). A mitogenomic phylogeny of living primates. PLoS One, 8(7), e69504.
bp difference / site is the total number of bp differences divided by 16500 - the approximate average length of the mtgenomes
